summary: Rayya really needs hair don't you think?
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][b][u][size=5][center][b][u][size=5]Rayya with Hair[/size][/u][/b][/center]
[/size][/u][/b][/font][b][u][size=3]What does this do?[/size]
[/u][/b]Well obviously it gives hair to follower called Rayya.
There are two hair types to choose from: HairFemaleNord06 and HairFemaleNord21. (See pictures)

[b][u][size=3]How to install/Uninstall[/size]
[/u][/b]
[u]Nexus Mod Manager[/u] [color=#088A29](Recommended)[/color]
1. Click on the Download with Manager button
2. Install it using NMM
3. Done!

[u]Uninstall
[/u]1. Right click on the Rayya with Hair and click on Uninstall and delete archive
2. She has no hair!

[u]Manually[/u] [color=#cc0000](Not Recommended)[/color]
1. Download the file (Of course)
2. Open up the .zip file and move Rayya with Hair.esp and Meshes folder to your Skyrim/Data folder
4. Overwrite if promoted
5. Done!
[u]
Uninstall[/u]
1. Go to Data folder and delete Rayya with Hair.esp
2. Go to Data\Meshes\actors\character\FaceGenData\FaceGeom\HeartFires.esm\ and delete 00005215.NIF file
3. Oh no she's bald again!

[size=3][u][b]Compatibility[/b][/u][/size]
[size=2]Will conflict with every other mod that edits this Follower.[/size]
Works with Skyrim Special Edition

[b][size=5]Be Sure to check out my other Mod(s) and Remember to Rate and Endorse![/size][/b]
author: FinAllu2
